snippet: Yoël Zaoui, one of Goldman Sachs's most senior deal makers, is the latest executive to leave the firm and its partnership.
abstract: Yoël Zaoui, one of Goldman Sachs's most senior deal makers, is the latest executive to leave the firm and its partnership.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: A Goldman Co-Head of Global Mergers to Step Down
